block.p: $710,000 95 Greene Street 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in a pre-World War II loft building; elevator, dining area, 11-ft. ceilings, hardwood floors, Italianate marble in kitchen with cherry-wood counters, whirlpool bath, central air-conditioning, washer-dryer in unit; common charge, $383; taxes, $3,000; listed at $749,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Clayman Realty Group)

$710,000 95 Greene Street 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in a pre-World War II loft building; elevator, dining area, 11-ft. ceilings, hardwood floors, Italianate marble in kitchen with cherry-wood counters, whirlpool bath, central air-conditioning, washer-dryer in unit; common charge, $383; taxes, $3,000; listed at $749,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Clayman Realty Group)

$810,000 222 West 14th Street (Sequoia) 1-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,060-sq.-ft. duplex condo in a post-World War II building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, fireplace, 2 terraces, windowed kitchen, hot tub, gym in building; common charge, $585; taxes, $4,200; listed at $850,000, 9 weeks on market (brokers: Silverman Group, D. J. Knight)

$650,000 400 East 56th Street (Plaza 400) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,374-sq.-ft. condo in a post-World War II building; dining room, concierge, windowed kitchen, balcony, pool and health club in building; maintenance, $1,655; includes gas and electricity; 57% tax-deductible; listed at $695,000, 8 weeks on market (brokers: Corcoran Group, David Day Real Estate)

$2.264 million 610 Park Avenue (65th Street) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,100-sq.-ft. condo in a pre-World War II building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, elevator operators, dining room; recently renovated throughout; marble baths; common charge, $1,430; taxes, $17,640; listed at $2.264 million, 1 year on market (broker: Peter Ashe)

$540,000 201 West 72d Street (Alexandria) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,077-sq.-ft. condo in a 7-year-old building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, hardwood floors, sun deck, pool, health club and valet housekeeping in building; common charge, $741; taxes, $5,064; listed at $575,000, 13 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$642,000 167 Baltic Street 3-family, 4-story brownstone; 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, dining room in primary duplex; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath on top floor; 1 bedroom, 1 bath on ground floor; eat-in kitchens in both units; decorative fireplaces, original molding and detail; 25-by-74-ft. lot; taxes, $2,287; listed at $695,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Harbor View Realty)

$550,000 549 First Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,000-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a pre-World War II building; dining room, stained-glass windows, marble mantels; maintenance, $350; no tax deduction; listed at $575,000, 6 weeks on market (broker: Susan N. Breen)

$535,000 179 Marlborough Road 7-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, detached Colonial revival built in 1899; dining room, eat-in kitchen, parquet floors, 2-car garage, in historical district, 60-by-180-ft. lot; taxes, $3,000; listed at $490,000 (multiple bids), 22 weeks on market (broker: Mary Kay Gallagher)

$630,000 252 Clinton Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 33-year-old Colonial style; 2-story entry foyer and gallery, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, den, 2 balconies, winter view of Hudson River, 2-car garage, 3/4-acre lot; taxes, $20,730; listed at $695,000, 14 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Dobbs Ferry)

$940,000 78 Butternut Hollow 5-bedroom, 4-bath, 41-year-old Colonial-style ranch, renovated in 1988; dining room, eat-in kitchen, heated solarium, fireplace, central air-conditioning, 2-car garage, 2.27-acre lot; taxes, $10,678; listed at $1.05 million, 35 weeks on market (brokers: William Raveis Real Estate, Weichert Realtors)

$885,000 41 Summit Road 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath Colonial style; new center hall, dining room, family room with cathedral ceilings, fireplace, eat-in kitchen with cherry cabinets and granite counter tops, whirlpool bath and exercise room in basement, 70-by-183-ft. fenced lot; taxes not yet determined: listed at $895,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)
